children.name: adversaries
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: am
children.sourceText: For I will make my people with whom the Father hath covenanted, yea, I will make thy horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass. And thou shalt beat in pieces many people; and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth. And behold, I am he who doeth it.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: beasts
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: beat
children.sourceText: For I will make my people with whom the Father hath covenanted, yea, I will make thy horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass. And thou shalt beat in pieces many people; and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth. And behold, I am he who doeth it.

children.name: chariots
children.sourceText: for it shall come to pass in that day,that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots;

children.name: cities
children.sourceText: And I will cut off the cities of thy land, and throw down all thy strongholds;

children.name: consecrate
children.sourceText: For I will make my people with whom the Father hath covenanted, yea, I will make thy horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass. children.name: cut
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: day
children.sourceText: for it shall come to pass in that day,that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots;

children.name: enemies
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: execute
children.sourceText: And I will execute vengeance and fury upon them, even as upon the heathen, such as they have not heard.

children.name: father
children.sourceText: For I will make my people with whom the Father hath covenanted, yea, I will make thy horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass. And thou shalt beat in pieces many people; and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth. And behold, I am he who doeth it.

children.name: flocks
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: floor
children.sourceText: And I will gather my people together as a man gathereth his sheaves into the floor.

children.name: forest
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.sourceText: And I will gather my people together as a man gathereth his sheaves into the floor.

children.name: Gentiles
children.sourceText: remnant of Jacob shall be among the Gentiles, yea, in the midst of them as a lion among the beasts of the forest, as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he go through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: graven
children.sourceText: Thy graven images I will also cut off, and thy standing images out of the midst of thee, and thou shalt no more worship the works of thy hands;

children.name: groves
children.sourceText: And I will pluck up thy groves out of the midst of thee; so will I destroy thy cities.

children.name: it shall come to pass
